column1: A celebration of his life will be held at 10:00 AM on Saturday June 13
column2: 2015 at DeJong-Greaves Celebration of Life Center at 917 Blondeau Street in Keokuk with Theresa DeJong as celebrant.  Visitation will be held on Friday
column4: 2015 at DeJong-Greaves Celebration of Life Center on Blondeau from 6 to 8 PM
column5: when family will meet with friends.
